snippet.title: Never Mourn - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Join developer Primal Seed for a deep dive into some new Never Mourn gameplay from the upcoming action RPG with roguelike elements. The video showcases your weapon--the double-edged Staff of Equilibrium--abilities, types of monsters, the necromancy mechanic, creating and utilizing your army, levels, the talent tree, and more. Never Mourn is heading to Steam Early Access on May 13, 2024.

Never Mourn features a necromancy system that sees players wield the double-edged Staff of Equilibrium. Armed with this bringer of death (and life), Necromancers will get to work slaying the hostile forces that oppose them on a quest through the dark fantasy world that Never Mourn’s protagonist Irea inhabits. Each defeated foe can be reanimated and recruited into a growing legion of the dead at the player's command on this quest of resilience and resurrection.
